item.title: Mentioned by Prince Albert Daily Herald
item.description:
Hoback talks Senate reform, prorogation
Senate reform is the most pressing federal issue on the minds of Prince Albert constituents, according to MP Randy Hoback. Topics : Prince Albert , Supreme Court , Conservatives , Ottawa. Fresh from recent gall bladder surgery, Hoback took a few minutes to ...

item.title: Mentioned by Canada NewsWire (press release)
item.description:
Member of Parliament Randy Hoback Honours Canadian Peacekeepers
9, 2013 /CNW/ - On behalf of the Honourable Julian Fantino, Minister of Veterans Affairs, Randy Hoback, Member of Parliament for Prince Albert, today joined members of the North Saskatchewan Chapter of the Canadian Association of Veterans in United Nations Peacekeeping at the ... "It was on this day in 1974 that Canada suffered its greatest single-day loss of lives on a United Nations peacekeeping mission, when nine of our own were killed while flying a supply mission in the Middle East," said MP Hoback.

item.description:
Member of Parliament Randy Hoback Celebrates Veterans during Wounded ...
3, 2013 — /CNW/ - On behalf of the Honourable Julian Fantino, Minister of Veterans Affairs, Randy Hoback, Member of Parliament for Prince Albert, joined Veterans, members of the Royal Canadian Legion, community leaders and members of the public today for the second annual Wounded Warriors Weekend. "Today we show support for ... "I am honoured to be here this weekend to meet with Veterans and hear about their experiences as they served our great country," said MP Hoback.
